content: **final version uploaded 12/29/18** please download the new version if your pattern was earlier than that in the southern part of quebec canada just over the border from vermont usa lies the fictional village of three pines this idyllic hamlet created by louise penny is home to the most wonderful complex and engaging characters i ve ever read…or rather listened to via audiobook the adventures of chief inspector armand gamache have kept me company through many many knitting projects the motif of the three pines on the front of the mitts will always keep me longing to return
